title: Making is Greater Than Blessing
subtitle: An Exhortation on Biblical Giving
speaker: Special Exhortation
summary: This exhortation challenges believers to understand that God's purpose in calling us to give is not primarily about receiving blessings, but about transforming us into the image of Christ. It addresses two extremes: giving to get blessed, and not giving because we feel we already have enough. True biblical giving reflects Christ's sacrificial love and transforms the giver's character.
keyPoints: God's primary goal is to make us into the image of His Son, not merely to bless us
We should not give to gain blessings or out of need, but to become like Christ
The church in the West faces the Laodicean danger of self-sufficiency
Jesus gave knowing many would not respond - we are called to the same sacrificial generosity
Giving detaches our hearts from material things and attaches us to the Lord
